name: Tracklayer
description:
Tracklayer is a game for Curdle Jam 11... very late entry.

The theme for Curdle Jam 11 was "ahead of the game", and in Tracklayer, you must stay ahead of the car, laying down the track it travels on.

The currently available version is a prototype/game jam entry; this may be developed further, or it might not.

Controls

  • D-Pad – Move Cursor (sorry for no "press and hold" movement)
  • A Button – Cycle track tile forward
  • B Button – Cycle track tile backwards
  • Start Button – Pause/unpause
